summary: An IPS officer motivates and leads a dysfunctional, corrupt police force of Tezpur to fight against the corrupt politician.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Gracy Singh|Mohan Joshi|Yashpal Sharma|Akhilendra Mishra|Mukesh Tiwari|Ayub Khan|Chetan Pandit|Anup Soni|Mohan Agashe|Yash Gawli|Payal Srivastava|Daya Shankar Pandey|Manyata Dutt|Brij Gopal|Mahesh Gupta|Anita Kanwal|Abhijit Lahiri|Manoj Rajdutt|Kranti Redkar|Ajai Rohilla|Paritosh Sand|Vishnu Sharma|Padam Singh|Sanjay Swaraj
title: Gangaajal
